briefTitle: A Couples Approach to Enhance Breast Cancer Survivorship
officialTitle: A Couples Approach to Enhance Breast Cancer Survivorship
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Relationship Functioning, Individual Functioning, Cancer Related Physical Functioning
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Diagnosed with early stage breast cancer within last year
* No history of breast cancer, or other cancers in last 5 years (except skin cancer)
* Living together in a committed heterosexual relationship
* read and speak English
* Agree to participate

Exclusion Criteria:

* Stage 3b and above breast cancer
* Notable psychopathology, including severe depression with suicidality
